title: Giving You a Good Night’s Sleep!
detail_text: <:th_ch0101/>Kotori-chan, you can’t sleep if your pillow is changed, right?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Yeah…. Though it’s less of can’t sleep and more of will have a bad sleep….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Can’t have a good sleep without the right pillow…. This is a big problem….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Umm, Chika-chan….?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>So, I was thinking if we could offer a new service to help our customers sleep well at our family inn. So I’d love to hear your opinions, Kotori-chan, since you’re a bit picky about pillows<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Eeh! Are you sure about me? If it’s about helping people get a good night's sleep, wouldn’t Kanata-san be a better person to ask than I am?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Actually, I’ve already asked Kanata-san…. But….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>But?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>“There’s no good or bad pillow, there’s just one’s desire to sleep” or so, she replied<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Ah…. she did say that she can sleep with any pillow…. Alright, Chika-chan. If it’s about pillows, you can ask me!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
